mapper.select: /* QUERY ID : getGroupPurchaseProducts */ SELECT a.group_purchase_id "groupPurchaseId" ,a.product_id "productId" ,(SELECT name FROM product WHERE prod_id = a.product_id) "productName" ,(SELECT user_name FROM cmm_user WHERE user_id = (SELECT seller FROM product WHERE prod_id = a.product_id)) "productOwner" ,a.stop_selling "stopSelling" ,a.stop_selling_reason "stopSellingReason" ,a.use_yn "useYn" ,a.create_datetime "createDatetime" ,a.modify_datetime "modifyDatetime" ,a.creator "creator" FROM group_purchase_product a WHERE 1 = 1 AND UPPER(a.group_purchase_id) = UPPER(#{groupPurchaseId}) AND UPPER(a.product_id) = UPPER(#{productId}) AND UPPER(a.stop_selling) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{stopSelling}), '%') AND UPPER(a.stop_selling_reason) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{stopSellingReason}), '%') AND UPPER(a.use_yn) = UPPER(#{useYn}) AND str_to_date(#{createDatetime}, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(a.create_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') AND str_to_date(#{modifyDatetime}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(a.modify_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') AND UPPER(a.creator) = UPPER(#{creator}) ORDER BY a.group_purchase_id ASC, a.product_id ASC LIMIT #{pagenationPage}, #{pagenationPageSize}

/* QUERY ID : getTotalCntGroupPurchaseProducts */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM group_purchase_product a WHERE 1 = 1 AND UPPER(a.group_purchase_id) = UPPER(#{groupPurchaseId}) AND UPPER(a.product_id) = UPPER(#{productId}) AND UPPER(a.stop_selling) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{stopSelling}), '%') AND UPPER(a.stop_selling_reason) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{stopSellingReason}), '%') AND UPPER(a.use_yn) = UPPER(#{useYn}) AND str_to_date(#{createDatetime}, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(a.create_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') AND str_to_date(#{modifyDatetime}, '%Y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(a.modify_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d') AND UPPER(a.creator) = UPPER(#{creator})
